body:
Hey guys I've been making a PvP resource pack for a while (Almost all the textures are from other texture packs and I don't take full credit for the textures) and I'm finally releasing it =)

Its called "Gabouyd" because that means "Blue" in Armenian, which is my nationality.

Things to know- 

Its almost all 16x16

Good for FPS

Blue themed

Default edited

70 or so pictures beware!

No HD textures except for the icons, widgets and so on.

Pictures (no pics no clicks right? =D)

This includes:

Sexy swords

Color coded awesome bow

Blue sexy fishing rod

Custom sky

Sexy particles

Non-movable enchant glow, for less lag (now you WILL be getting about 10 to 20 FPS more on Pot PvP and 1 shot maps)

Blue themed textures

Golden and normal apples have a derp face

Custom language

Pumpkin HUD all cleared

Invisible GUI

Blue FnS

almost all 16x16 textures

Brighter obsidian (Refined Nebula from ViolentBooGaming)

Instead of cracks, numbers for breaking animations (Refined Nebula from ViolentBooGaming)

Says "Rekt" with a robotic voice when you shoot someone with an arrow

Makes a "Thump" sound when arrow hits solid material (or you block head ;D)

Great for Rushing!

Images-http://imgur.com/AnM3lTh,aqNWB4o,cGRKiz3,cGG6yJM,l5QoSjj,BEwEuvH,fFOICZi,XQk66KW,lQWdDha,izNs0la,3gu...
Download-http://www.mediafire.com/download/s36535zq7fe362l/%C2%A7k3++%C2%A71Gabouyd+%C2%A74Pack+%C2%A7k3.zip

PS-For all of you that cant pronounce "Gabouyd"...

G- Like goggles
A- Like apple
B- Like bike
OU- like Oops
Y- Like Yoyo
D- Like Duck

replies.body: Any good tutorials to help me download texture packs? I always use default.
replies.body_tagged: Any good tutorials to help me download texture packs? I always use default.

replies.body:
Windows 8- 

1-Press the windows button on your keyboard and r at the same time and you will get the run tab open, this is basically a search bar.

2-Type %appdata%, roaming, .minecraft

3-If you dont already have one, make one or open your minecraft go to resource packs in options and press open resource pack folder.

4-Download the resource pack

5-Drag or copy and paste the resource pack in the resource pack folder.

6-Your done!

For windows 7 or lower-

Windows 8 tutorial only scrap number 1 and do number 2 in the search bar.
replies.body_tagged:

1-Press the windows button on your keyboard and r at the same time and you will get the run tab open, this is basically a search bar.

4-Download the resource pack

5-Drag or copy and paste the resource pack in the resource pack folder.

6-Your done!

For windows 7 or lower-

Windows 8 tutorial only scrap number 1 and do number 2 in the search bar.

replies.body:
There are alot of things people would not like, for instance the sounds, language, and the stay-still enchant glow. Here's how to fix it!

Enchant glow-Go to your resource pack, go to textures and go to misc. Take a texture pack that has default everything and go to that texture packs misc folder. Take the "enchant_glow.png" and "enchant_glow.mcmeta" and put them into this resource pack's bin folder.

Sound-Go to my resource pack and delete the sounds folder.

Language- This is really easy. Go to languages and if your language is set to Us English (Put it on that for the colors and custom names), put it to Canadian english.

Hope this helped!
replies.body_tagged:

Sound-Go to my resource pack and delete the sounds folder.

Language- This is really easy. Go to languages and if your language is set to Us English (Put it on that for the colors and custom names), put it to Canadian english.

Hope this helped!
